segments.text: I would love to rent this apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m happy to hear you say that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much are you asking for every month ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m renting this apartment out for $ 1050 a month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is quite a lot of money for just one month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you say to $ 850 a month ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s either $ 850 or nothing at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I won ’ t go any lower than $ 1050 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s the best I can do .
segments.speaker: S2
